title: quickest way to get orange essence ??
body: Hey all i brought a lunar bundle pack, oppend it all and get a fair few legendary and legacy etc skins, i want to use them but i need heaps of orange essence, tldr feel ripped wasted $50 on something that i cant use gg

replies.body: The whole Blue and Orange Essence is scam bullshit. Trust me, I've spent about $400 on it and gained maybe $60 worth of anything and that's being generous. All up I've spent $1800

Either spend more money for more loot and hope they are skins you want to disenchant, patiently and diligently get your free loot boxes, or just do what I do and keep them in your loot inventory and cry when you realize its gonna be years before you can get them. 

There isn't really any quick way to get orange essence.
